Test Name: Neisseria gonorrhoeae Nucleic Acid Amplification Test (NAAT)
Specimen Type: Swab specimens from urogenital tract, rectum, pharynx, and conjunctiva
Purpose: To detect Neisseria gonorrhoeae in clinical specimens using nucleic acid amplification for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Manufacturer-approved NAAT swab collection kit with sterile, nuclease-free tubes
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument, Neisseria gonorrhoeae NAAT kit, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filter tips
